QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled GroundControl will automatically connect to a vehicle which is detected on a UDP communication link.
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: autoConnectUDP
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Automatically open a connection over UDP

QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled GroundControl will automatically connect to a Pixhawk board which is connected via USB.
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: autoConnectPixhawk
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Automatically connect to a Pixhawk board

QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled GroundControl will automatically connect to a vehicle which is detected on a SiK Radio communication link.
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: autoConnectSiKRadio
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Automatically connect to a SiK Radio

QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled GroundControl will automatically connect to an RTK GPS which is connected via USB.
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: autoConnectRTKGPS
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Automatically connect to an RTK GPS

QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled GroundControl will automatically connect to a LibrePilot board which is connected via USB.
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: autoConnectLibrePilot

QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: NMEA GPS device for GCS position
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: autoConnectNmeaPort
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: NMEA GPS device for GCS position

QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled GroundControl will automatically connect to a vehicle which is detected over Zero-Conf.
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: autoConnectZeroConf
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Automatically open a connection with Zero-Conf

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: udpTargetHostIP
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: UDP target host IP for autoconnect

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: udpTargetHostPort
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: UDP target host port for autoconnect

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: nmeaUdpPort
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Udp port to receive NMEA streams
